Etienne Klein & Marc Lachièze-Rey, The Quest for Unity - The Adventure of Physics, p. 84

"Feyerabend argued that the very idea of a rational method is a fantasy ... even the ideal of coherence seems to (him) incompatible with the course of science ... Feyerabend’s broadside is beneficial in that it might awaken those who tend to lapse into a dangerous dogmatic somnolence."
